tool_description: Matches call requirements with agent skills and expertise to identify the most suitable agents for handling the call.

required_skills.description: Array of skills required to handle this call

customer_tier.description: Customer service tier requiring specific agent level

error_messages: No matching agents: No agents found with required skills and availability.
Invalid skill category: One or more required skills not recognized in system.
Insufficient agent pool: Not enough qualified agents available for current demand.
Language not supported: Requested language preference not available.
usage: Provide call_category, call_subcategory, and required_skills, with optional language_preference, customer_tier, urgency_level, and minimum_experience to find matching agents.

qualified_agents.description: Array of agent IDs that match the requirements

skill_match_scores.description: Skill matching scores for each qualified agent

total_matches.description: Total number of agents that match requirements
